compatibility.notes: OpenSSL is generally permissive and can be used in proprietary software, but care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the OpenSSL license text in all redistributions.
Provide proper attribution to the OpenSSL Project in advertising materials.
Obtain permission for trademark use and naming.
license.name: OpenSSL
obligations: Retain copyright notice and list of conditions in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and list of conditions in binary redistributions.
Display acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Do not use the names 'OpenSSL Toolkit' and 'OpenSSL Project' for endorsement without permission.
Do not use 'OpenSSL' in product names without permission.
Retain acknowledgment in all forms of redistribution.
